mapper.select: SELECT H.JYS,--交易所编码 T.JYS AS JYSINFO, --交易所简称 T.FXSJ,--风险时间 T.FXLB,--风险类别 ROUND(AVG(T.WRZS),2) AS WRZS --未然指数 FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ T LEFT JOIN HUB_REF_JYSINFO H ON H.JYSINFO=T.JYS WHERE T.FXSJ = (SELECT MAX(FXSJ) FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) AND H.JYS=#{jys} GROUP BY H.JYS,T.JYS,T.FXSJ,T.FXLB order by fxlb
